author: legogal
title: Get juiced up with this juice bar!
review:
Yikes! TLG has done it again. Andrea and Naya are having a blast at the Heartlake Juice Bar. Just brought this beauty home and put it together while cooking dinner. Here are a few comments to help you decide if it is the set for you.

The colors rock right off the table; lime green with two shades of orange and pink, bright light yellow, and more. A blast of pastels are perfect for our sunless, dreary, winter storm day. 

The accessories are first class. My favorites are the new printed pineapple, drink blenders, citrus press, and Naya the newest Friend. 

The design is also a winner with lots of glass walls to make the interior bright and visible. 

This is a happy set; build it and have fun is what it screams. Maximum playability? Have a big party for all the Friends and their Friends and invite a few regular figs they have not yet met. Meet you there for one of my famous mango smoothies!

author: Bella_Sparkle
title: Juicy fun!
review:
Another addictive Lego friends set! Fantastic detail!

Box/Instructions

The box shows just how much fun Lego friends can be. Instructions are clear and concise!

Parts

Great color palette yet again. Extremely detailed! Magnificent!

Minifigures

Great to see more characters being introduced to the Lego friends range!

The build

Great. But younger girls may need help with the stickers.

The completed model

Very fun. A suggestion is to play with friends.

Overall opinion

This set is an enjoyable addition to any young collectors collection!

author: Jonesy37
title: Really cool
review: Its definitely amazing and cool. I think it's a great idea to build it with a friend which I did, and we had lots of fun. This is great for six to twelve year-olds as it is fun and exciting to build. I hope I gathered enough info for you to decide if you want to get it or not.
